Question
========

We assume that events A and B are disjoint. We know that P(A) = 2/3 and P(B)=0. Are they also independent of each other?

Answerlist
----------

* Yes
* No

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Yes: Correct
* No: Incorrect
